text: keneku tama paramadhipatigen vu pæhædili sadhakayak laba æti vitaka, saha (eya tahavuru kirima vas) tavat saksikaruvaku allahgen pæmini vitaka, emenma ita pera maga penvimak ha dayavak vasayen musage pustakaya da tibiya di (eya pitupanuye) kumana pudgalayaku da? ovuhu eya visvasa karati. tavada jana samuhayan aturin kavareku eya pratiksepa karanne da evita ohuge pratigna denu læbu sthanaya (nira) ginnaya. ebævin numba e gæna sækayehi pasu novanu. niyata vasayenma eyayi numbage paramadhipatigen vu satyaya. namut janaya aturin bahutarayak dena eya visvasa nokarati
